heading: ***WIND ADVISORY FOR SOUTHERN VT, MA, AND NH THROUGH THIS EVENING***Today
text: Mostly cloudy, with limited sun in southern valleys, and scattered snow showers in the north and mountains, numerous over the higher terrain, with a dusting to 2 inches. Blustery and cold. Highs 10 to 15 north, upper teens near 20 south. Winds becoming west 10 to 20 mph, gusting 25 to 35 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Any snow showers north and east ending. Clearing after midnight, then clouds and snow showers far southern VT. Cold. Lows zero to 10 above north, 10 to 15 south. Winds from the west 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph in the evening, becoming in light in wind-sheltered valleys.

heading: Wednesday
text: Early snow showers in the southern mountains. Morning sun north giving way to clouds. A rising chance of afternoon snow showers in NY, reaching northern VT late. Highs in the upper teens to low 20s north, 20s south. Light winds becoming southwest 10 to 15 mph.
